thread.title: China's Tsinghua Unigroup offers to buy Micron Technology for $23 bln -WSJ
thread.title_full: China's Tsinghua Unigroup offers to buy Micron Technology for $23 bln -WSJ | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: China's Tsinghua Unigroup offers to buy Micron Technology for $23 bln -WSJ
text:
July 14 China's Tsinghua Unigroup Ltd offered to buy U.S. memory chipmaker Micron Technology Inc for $23 billion, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
Tsinghua Unigroup offered $21 per share for Micron, which is at a 19.3 percent premium to the stock's close on Monday, the Journal said. ( on.wsj.com/1fE2GQm )
Micron was not immediately available to comment on the report.
(Reporting by Sneha Banerjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Stephen Coates)
